description.para: This module captures all Asterisk Manager Interface (AMI) events using an internal manager hook and publishes them to a Kafka topic via res_kafka.
Events can be published in JSON format (parsed from AMI key-value pairs) or as raw AMI text. The Kafka message key is set to the AMI event name for natural partitioning.
Set to yes to enable publishing AMI events to Kafka. Default is yes.
Set to json to parse AMI events into JSON objects, or ami to publish the raw AMI text as-is. Default is json.

configOption.name: connection
configOption.synopsis: Name of the connection from kafka.conf to use

description.para: This must match a connection name defined in kafka.conf for res_kafka.

configOption.name: topic
configOption.synopsis: Kafka topic to publish events to
